aboutpara: A business-minded, application developer with the drive to create applications that run on web browsers, mobile devices, and other related platforms. Highly motivated and accomplished Bachelor of Computer Science graduate from the University of NiÅ¡, where I graduated as the top student of my class. I believe that someone should hire me because I can provide leadership, loyalty, focus and overall, dedication to my position. I am also determined to become the best in my field because I believe the person who hires me deserves an expert developer who is at the pinnacle of his career.
